name: CoffeeBREAK!
description:
When you have a cup of coffee you always wonder, if it has the right amount of sugar necessary?  if doesn't have it then most likely you will leave it alone slowly but surely turning cold. This is my entry for the mini jam #8 BREAK, be a cup of coffee a collect amount of sugar cubes so that your coffee tasted really amazing. But beware you might BREAK while trying to reach the sugar and the time is running you might get cold!

Font made by: Jakob Fischer

site: www.pizzadude.dk

Note: if you want to quit the game manually you can press the esc key!
